strategies.details: List of Strategies and their keys

strategyMap.details: Mapping of addresses to strategies. Also used as reverse map of strategies to status.

devdoc.title: SmartStrategyAdmin: A standalone contract that manages strategy creation,  deletion, read and write data. Author: Simplifinance

createStrategy(address).notice: 'user' should not own a strategy before now.          only address with owner permission can call.
